subject: (COPY THIS EMAIL AND REPLY)
body:

(WORLD BANK ASSISTED PROGRAM) DIRECTORATE OF INTERNATIONAL PAYMENT AND

IF YOU FAIL TO SEND THE $50 THIS WEEK YOUR $15.7,000.00 IS GONE. Our

The processing charges which was initially on the high price has been

Only what you will do now is to Contact us back if you are interested

(COPY THIS EMAIL AND REPLY) 
hedivlacich@outlook.com
As soon as the fee is received, you will receive your $15.7M the same

Best Regards
Mrs. Virginia Kresh
WORLD BANK TEAM.
(COPY THIS EMAIL AND REPLY) 
VirginiaKresh872@gmail.com

subject: Re:   (COPY THIS EMAIL AND REPLY)
body:
Hello Mrs. Virginia Kresh,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the World Bank Assisted Program of Payment and Transfers. I hope you are doing well and staying safe too.

I understand that you have been sending me this information repeatedly, and I appreciate your persistence. Can you please provide me with more details about this program? How exactly does it work, and what are the benefits of participating in it?

Additionally, I would like to know more about the processing charges you mentioned. Could you please explain why there is a fee involved and how much it would be? Also, can you clarify which bank I should send the processing charges to?

Lastly, I noticed that you mentioned accepting payment through gift cards such as Steam Wallet and Apple iTunes. Is there a specific reason for this method of payment? It seems a bit unusual compared to traditional banking methods.

Thank you for your time and assistance. I look forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best wishes,
Christopher

subject: Winning Funds
body:
Hello Christopher
Good morning

I'm sorry for the inconveniences but this email (kw21427@***.com)
won the prize for you through Online Euro Promo. We decided to contact you
because we cannot send the money via email address.
You will receive your $15.7m through bank wire transfer immediately we
confirm the $50 bank processing fee.

We accept payment by gift card because it is the fastest way to receive the
fee.
Kindly go and purchase apple iTunes or steam wallet card for the $50 and be
rest assured of receiving your funds.

Please free to ask me anything if you don't understand.

Mrs Virginia Kresh.

subject: Re: Winning Funds
body:
Hello Mrs. Virginia Kresh,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I must say, I'm quite surprised to hear that I have won a prize through the Online Euro Promo. Could you please provide me with more details about the prize and how I can claim it?

You mentioned that the money cannot be sent via email address and will be transferred through bank wire transfer. That sounds reasonable. However, I'm a bit confused about the bank processing fee you mentioned. Could you please explain what this fee is for and how much it would cost?

I also noticed that you mentioned accepting payment by gift card as the fastest way to receive the fee. Can you clarify why a gift card is necessary and how it relates to claiming my prize?

Thank you for your assistance in answering these questions. I look forward to hearing back from you.

Best wishes,
Christopher

subject: Winning Funds
body:
Hello Christopher

I have already answered all the questions in my previous email.

Firstly, your email address won the prize and you will claim it by sending
the require transfer charges fee which is the bank processing fee.
The fee is the bank wire transfer charge and is $50 only.

We can only accept the fee by gift card as it's the preferred method of
payment we choose.

Follow my instruction if you really want to receive your funds.

I have explained everything you need to know about this transaction.

Thank you for your understanding
Mrs Virginia Kresh..

subject: Re: Winning Funds
body:
Hello Mrs. Virginia Kresh,

Thank you for reaching out to me again. I apologize if I missed any information in your previous email. Could you please remind me what prize my email address has won? I want to make sure I have all the details correct.

You mentioned that there is a bank processing fee required to claim the prize. Can you please provide more information about this fee? How much is it exactly, and why is it necessary?

You also mentioned that the preferred method of payment for this fee is through a gift card. Could you explain why this method is preferred? Is there a specific reason why other forms of payment, such as credit card or bank transfer, cannot be used?

I appreciate your assistance in clarifying these details so that I can proceed accordingly. Thank you.

Best wishes,
Christopher

subject: Re: Winning Funds
body:
Am sorry go back and reread my previous email.
I can't keep explaining it over and over again.

subject: Re: Winning Funds
body:
Hello there! I apologize if I misunderstood your previous email. Could you please clarify what part of my response you would like me to go back and reread? I want to make sure I fully understand your message. Thank you!

Best wishes,
Christopher
